law.catch_line: A person may not, by threat, force, or corrupt means, obstruct, impede, or try to obstruct or impede...

text.section: A person may not, by threat, force, or corrupt means, obstruct, impede, or try to obstruct or impede the administration of justice in a court of the State.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 5 years or a fine not exceeding $10,000 or both.
